text: @weijia This is absolutely bonkers. The ONLY way to fully reopen the economy is to increase testing to find & isolate Covid-19 cases & prevent spread. This is what we get with a reality show presidency (it runs in the family - just look at Ivanka Trump doing Instagram diplomacy).
